name: py-pyscipopt
description: Python interface for the SCIP Optimization Suite

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: scipoptsuite
dependencies.description:
The SCIP Optimization Suite is a toolbox for generating and solving
mixed integer nonlinear programs, in particular mixed integer linear
programs, and constraint integer programs Note: A manual download is
required for SCIP. Spack will search your current directory for the
download file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack
can find it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
